mapper.insert: insert into tb_follow (follower, followee, followed_date) values (#{follower}, #{followee}, now())
mapper.select:
select follower, (select count(*) from tb_follow i where i.follower = #{followee} and i.followee = follower) as isFollowToo from tb_follow f
JOIN tb_character c ON f.follower = c.character_seq
where followee=#{followee}
and c.nickname like CONCAT(#{nickname}, '%')

select followee from tb_follow f
JOIN tb_character c ON f.followee = c.character_seq
where follower=#{follower}
and c.nickname like CONCAT(#{nickname}, '%')
